773510.name: The Hardest Thing
773510.description:
In your journey you will discover many different locations, levels, and game elements, all pointing towards the main goal which is to knock down the bullseye block with the help of a ball and your surroundings. It may sound easy at first, but you will soon discover that as you progress each level goes from super simple to crazily complex and more rooms will be opened for you and your adventures. The more puzzles you solve, the more you will discover.

How you decide to reach the final goal is completely up to your imagination!
773510.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
